verses.verse: Be <S%G1096><s%> ye therefore <S%G3767><s%> followers <S%G3402><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> dear <S%G27><s%> children: <S%G5043><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> love, <S%G26><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> hath loved <S%G25><s%> us, <S%G2248><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hath given <S%G3860><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> us <S%G2257><s%> an offering <S%G4376><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a sacrifice <S%G2378><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> a sweetsmelling <S%G2175><s%> savor. <S%G3744><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> fornication, <S%G4202><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> uncleanness, <S%G167><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> covetousness, <S%G4124><s%> let it not be once named <S%G3366><s%> <S%G3687><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> becometh <S%G4241><s%> saints; <S%G40><s%>

Neither <S%G2532><s%> filthiness, <S%G151><s%> nor <S%G2532><s%> foolish talking, <S%G3473><s%> nor <S%G2228><s%> jesting, <S%G2160><s%> which are not convenient: <S%G433><s%> <S%G3756><s%> but <S%G235><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> giving of thanks. <S%G2169><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> ye know, <S%G2075><s%> <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> whoremonger, <S%G4205><s%> nor <S%G2228><s%> unclean person, <S%G169><s%> nor <S%G2228><s%> covetous man, <S%G4123><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> an idolater, <S%G1496><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> any <S%G3956><s%> inheritance <S%G2817><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Let no man <S%G3367><s%> deceive <S%G538><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> with vain <S%G2756><s%> words: <S%G3056><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of these things <S%G5023><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> children <S%G5207><s%> of disobedience. <S%G543><s%>
Be <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> ye therefore <S%G3767><s%> partakers <S%G4830><s%> with them. <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> ye were <S%G2258><s%> sometimes <S%G4218><s%> darkness, <S%G4655><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> are ye light <S%G5457><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord: <S%G2962><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> of light: <S%G5457><s%>

(For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> goodness <S%G19><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> truth;) <S%G225><s%>
Proving <S%G1381><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> acceptable <S%G2101><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> have no fellowship <S%G4790><s%> <S%G3361><s%> with the <S%G3588><s%> unfruitful <S%G175><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> of darkness, <S%G4655><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> <S%G2532><s%> reprove <S%G1651><s%> them.

For <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> a shame <S%G149><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> to speak <S%G3004><s%> of those things which are done <S%G1096><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> them <S%G846><s%> in secret. <S%G2931><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> that are reproved <S%G1651><s%> are made manifest <S%G5319><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> light: <S%G5457><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> whatsoever <S%G3956><s%> doth make manifest <S%G5319><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> light. <S%G5457><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> he saith, <S%G3004><s%> Awake <S%G1453><s%> thou that sleepest, <S%G2518><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> arise <S%G450><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> dead, <S%G3498><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> shall give thee light. <S%G2017><s%> <S%G4671><s%>

See <S%G991><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> that <S%G4459><s%> ye walk <S%G4043><s%> circumspectly, <S%G199><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> fools, <S%G781><s%> but <S%G235><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> wise, <S%G4680><s%>
Redeeming <S%G1805><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> time, <S%G2540><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> evil. <S%G4190><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> ye not <S%G3361><s%> unwise, <S%G878><s%> but <S%G235><s%> understanding <S%G4920><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> will <S%G2307><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> is.

And <S%G2532><s%> be not drunk <S%G3182><s%> <S%G3361><s%> with wine, <S%G3631><s%> wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> excess; <S%G810><s%> but <S%G235><s%> be filled <S%G4137><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the Spirit; <S%G4151><s%>

Speaking <S%G2980><s%> to yourselves <S%G1438><s%> in psalms <S%G5568><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hymns <S%G5215><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%> songs, <S%G5603><s%> singing <S%G103><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> making melody <S%G5567><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%>

Giving thanks <S%G2168><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> unto God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%>
Submitting yourselves <S%G5293><s%> one to another <S%G240><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the fear <S%G5401><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
Wives, <S%G1135><s%> submit yourselves <S%G5293><s%> unto your own <S%G2398><s%> husbands, <S%G435><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> husband <S%G435><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the head <S%G2776><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> wife, <S%G1135><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> is the head <S%G2776><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> church: <S%G1577><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the savior <S%G4990><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> body. <S%G4983><s%>

Therefore <S%G235><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> church <S%G1577><s%> is subject unto <S%G5293><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> let the <S%G3588><s%> wives <S%G1135><s%> be to their own <S%G2398><s%> husbands <S%G435><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> every thing. <S%G3956><s%>

Husbands, <S%G435><s%> love <S%G25><s%> your <S%G1438><s%> wives, <S%G1135><s%> even as <S%G2531><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> church, <S%G1577><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G3860><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> it; <S%G846><s%>
That <S%G2443><s%> he might sanctify <S%G37><s%> and cleanse <S%G2511><s%> it <S%G846><s%> with the <S%G3588><s%> washing <S%G3067><s%> of water <S%G5204><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the word, <S%G4487><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> he might present <S%G3936><s%> it <S%G846><s%> to himself <S%G1438><s%> a glorious <S%G1741><s%> church, <S%G1577><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> spot, <S%G4695><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> wrinkle, <S%G4512><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> such thing; <S%G5108><s%> but <S%G235><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> it should be <S%G5600><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> without blemish. <S%G299><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> ought <S%G3784><s%> men <S%G435><s%> to love <S%G25><s%> their <S%G1438><s%> wives <S%G1135><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> their own <S%G1438><s%> bodies. <S%G4983><s%> He that loveth <S%G25><s%> his <S%G1438><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> loveth <S%G25><s%> himself. <S%G1438><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> ever yet <S%G4218><s%> hated <S%G3404><s%> his own <S%G1438><s%> flesh; <S%G4561><s%> but <S%G235><s%> nourisheth <S%G1625><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cherisheth <S%G2282><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> church: <S%G1577><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> we are <S%G2070><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> body, <S%G4983><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> flesh, <S%G4561><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> bones. <S%G3747><s%>

For this cause <S%G473><s%> <S%G5127><s%> shall a man <S%G444><s%> leave <S%G2641><s%> his <S%G848><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> mother, <S%G3384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shall be joined <S%G4347><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> his <S%G848><s%> wife, <S%G1135><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they two <S%G1417><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> flesh. <S%G4561><s%>

This <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> mystery: <S%G3466><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> speak <S%G3004><s%> concerning <S%G1519><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> church. <S%G1577><s%>

Nevertheless <S%G4133><s%> let every one <S%G1538><s%> of you <S%G5210><s%> <S%G2532><s%> in particular <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1520><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> love <S%G25><s%> his <S%G1438><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> even as <S%G5613><s%> himself; <S%G1438><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> see that <S%G2443><s%> she reverence <S%G5399><s%> her husband. <S%G435><s%>
